example.parse: (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P كنا) (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نشهد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عند) (NP (PRON_1P نا))) (NP-OBJ (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC اقبال) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN شبان) (CONJ و) (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN شابات)) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الحياة)) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الكهنوتية) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الرهبانية))))))

arg.g: to the priesthood and monastic life
